resources.string: Number of times your heart beats per minute. Normal resting rate is 60 to 100 beats for a healthy adult.
Number of breaths you take per minute. Normal at-rest Breathing Rate is 12 to20 breaths per minute for a healthy adult.
PRQ indicates the state of cardio respiratory activity. Normal quotient range is 4 to 5.
Measure of how much oxygen the red blood cells are carrying from the lungs to the rest of the body. Normal SpO2 for healthy lungs ranges between 95%-100%.
Pressure of blood exerted on the walls of the arteries, which carry blood from theheart to other parts of the body. Normal systolic pressure is from 100 to 129.
Protein in a personâ€™s red blood cells that carries oxygen to the humanbody\'s organs and tissues. The healthy ranges are (Men: 14 to 18 g/dL, Women: 12 to 16 g/dL)
Represents the average blood glucose (sugar) level for the last two to three months. Normal is below 5.6%, 5.7% to 6.4% is Prediabetes risk and above 6.5% is Diabetes risk.
The higher the wellness score, the lower the cardiovascular risk.
